00053 static NPClass testClass = {
00054   NP_CLASS_STRUCT_VERSION,
00055   testAllocate,
00056   testDeallocate,
00057   0,
00058   testHasMethod,
00059   testInvoke,
00060   testInvokeDefault,
00061   testHasProperty,
00062   testGetProperty,
00063   0,
00064   0,
00065   testEnumerate,
00066   testConstruct

00069 NPClass* GetTestClass() {
00070   return &testClass;

00072 
00073 int testObjectCount = 0;
00074 
00075 int GetTestObjectCount() {
00076   return testObjectCount;
00077 }
00078 
00079 static bool identifiersInitialized = false;
00080 
00081 #define NUM_ENUMERABLE_TEST_IDENTIFIERS 4
00082 #define NUM_TEST_IDENTIFIERS            5
00083 
00084 #define ID_PROPERTY_FOO            0
00085 #define ID_PROPERTY_BAR            1
00086 #define ID_PROPERTY_TEST_OBJECT    2
00087 #define ID_PROPERTY_REF_COUNT      3
00088 #define ID_PROPERTY_OBJECT_POINTER 4
00089 
00090 static NPIdentifier testIdentifiers[NUM_TEST_IDENTIFIERS];
00091 static const NPUTF8 *testIdentifierNames[NUM_TEST_IDENTIFIERS] = {
00092   "foo",
00093   "bar",
00094   "testObject",
00095   "refCount",
00096   "objectPointer",
00097 };
00098 
00099 #define ID_THROW_EXCEPTION_METHOD  0
00100 #define NUM_METHOD_IDENTIFIERS     1
00101 
00102 static NPIdentifier testMethodIdentifiers[NUM_METHOD_IDENTIFIERS];
00103 static const NPUTF8 *testMethodIdentifierNames[NUM_METHOD_IDENTIFIERS] = {
00104   "throwException",
00105 };
00106 
00107 static void initializeIdentifiers(void) {
00108   browser->getstringidentifiers(testIdentifierNames,
00109                                 NUM_TEST_IDENTIFIERS,
00110                                 testIdentifiers);
00111   browser->getstringidentifiers(testMethodIdentifierNames,
00112                                 NUM_METHOD_IDENTIFIERS,
00113                                 testMethodIdentifiers);
00114 }
00115 
00116 static NPObject *testAllocate(NPP npp, NPClass *theClass) {
00117   TestObject *newInstance =
00118       static_cast<TestObject*>(malloc(sizeof(TestObject)));
00119   newInstance->test_object = NULL;
00120   ++testObjectCount;
00121 
00122   if (!identifiersInitialized) {
00123     identifiersInitialized = true;
00124     initializeIdentifiers();
00125   }
00126 
00127   return reinterpret_cast<NPObject*>(newInstance);
00128 }
00129 
00130 static void testDeallocate(NPObject *obj) {
00131   TestObject *testObject = reinterpret_cast<TestObject*>(obj);
00132   if (testObject->test_object)
00133     browser->releaseobject(testObject->test_object);
00134   --testObjectCount;
00135   free(obj);
00136 }
00137 
00138 static bool testHasMethod(NPObject*, NPIdentifier name) {
00139   for (unsigned i = 0; i < NUM_METHOD_IDENTIFIERS; i++) {
00140     if (testMethodIdentifiers[i] == name)
00141       return true;
00142   }
00143   return false;
00144 }
00145 
00146 static bool testInvoke(NPObject* header,
00147                        NPIdentifier name,
00148                        const NPVariant* args,
00149                        uint32_t argCount,
00150                        NPVariant* result) {
00151   if (name == testMethodIdentifiers[ID_THROW_EXCEPTION_METHOD]) {
00152     browser->setexception(header, "test object throwException SUCCESS");
00153     return true;
00154   }
00155   return false;
00156 }
00157 
00158 static bool testInvokeDefault(NPObject *obj,
00159                               const NPVariant *args,
00160                               uint32_t argCount,
00161                               NPVariant *result) {
00162   INT32_TO_NPVARIANT(2, *result);
00163   return true;
00164 }
00165 
00166 static bool testHasProperty(NPObject*, NPIdentifier name) {
00167   for (unsigned i = 0; i < NUM_TEST_IDENTIFIERS; i++) {
00168     if (testIdentifiers[i] == name)
00169       return true;
00170   }
00171   return false;
00172 }
00173 
00174 static bool testGetProperty(NPObject *obj,
00175                             NPIdentifier name,
00176                             NPVariant *variant) {
00177   if (name == testIdentifiers[ID_PROPERTY_FOO]) {
00178     const size_t kFooLength = 4;
00179     char* mem = static_cast<char*>(browser->memalloc(kFooLength));
00180     snprintf(mem, kFooLength, "foo");
00181     STRINGZ_TO_NPVARIANT(mem, *variant);
00182     return true;
00183   } else if (name == testIdentifiers[ID_PROPERTY_BAR]) {
00184     BOOLEAN_TO_NPVARIANT(true, *variant);
00185     return true;
00186   } else if (name == testIdentifiers[ID_PROPERTY_TEST_OBJECT]) {
00187     TestObject* testObject = reinterpret_cast<TestObject*>(obj);
00188     if (testObject->test_object == NULL)
00189       testObject->test_object = browser->createobject(NULL, &testClass);
00190     browser->retainobject(testObject->test_object);
00191     OBJECT_TO_NPVARIANT(testObject->test_object, *variant);
00192     return true;
00193   } else if (name == testIdentifiers[ID_PROPERTY_REF_COUNT]) {
00194     INT32_TO_NPVARIANT(obj->referenceCount, *variant);
00195     return true;
00196   } else if (name == testIdentifiers[ID_PROPERTY_OBJECT_POINTER]) {
00197     int32_t objectPointer =
00198         static_cast<int32_t>(reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(obj));
00199     INT32_TO_NPVARIANT(objectPointer, *variant);
00200     return true;
00201   }
00202   return false;
00203 }
00204 
00205 static bool testEnumerate(NPObject *npobj,
00206                           NPIdentifier **value,
00207                           uint32_t *count) {
00208   *count = NUM_ENUMERABLE_TEST_IDENTIFIERS;
00209   const size_t kTotalSize = *count * sizeof(NPIdentifier);
00210 
00211   *value = reinterpret_cast<NPIdentifier*>(browser->memalloc(kTotalSize));
00212   memcpy(*value, testIdentifiers, kTotalSize);
00213 
00214   return true;
00215 }
00216 
00217 static bool testConstruct(NPObject* npobj,
00218                           const NPVariant* args,
00219                           uint32_t argCount,
00220                           NPVariant* result) {
00221   browser->retainobject(npobj);
00222 
00223   // Just return the same object.
00224   OBJECT_TO_NPVARIANT(npobj, *result);
00225   return true;
00226 }
